entities.name: wizard
entities.description: The wizard is described as someone who is looking for something, specifically the right door. He is also mentioned to be wearing gloves on the wrong hands.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as a person who told the wizard the password 'Pine fresh'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who slipped inside the door and pulled off his Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is mentioned as something that Harry pulled off.

entities.name: bathroom
entities.description: The bathroom is described as a place with a splendid candle-filled chandelier and white marble everything.

entities.name: chandelier
entities.description: The chandelier is mentioned as something that is softly lit by candles.

entities.name: swimming pool
entities.description: The swimming pool is described as an empty, rectangular pool sunk in the middle of the floor.

entities.name: golden taps
entities.description: The golden taps are mentioned as being around the edges of the pool.

entities.name: jewel
entities.description: The jewel is described as something that is set into each handle of the golden taps.

entities.name: diving board
entities.description: The diving board is mentioned as being present in the bathroom.

entities.name: linen curtains
entities.description: The linen curtains are described as hanging at the windows.

entities.name: towels
entities.description: The towels are mentioned as being fluffy white and sitting in a corner.

entities.name: painting
entities.description: The painting is described as featuring a blonde mermaid.

relationships.description: Cedric told the wizard the password 'Pine fresh'.
Harry pulled off his Invisibility Cloak.
